Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "This won't do. Turning them off by hand is too inefficient. There might be up to hundreds of these devices here.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Can't we just use EMP grenades like in the Museum Estate?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's Strike Hawk equipment. Not Gray Raven.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But I know you have a habit of holding onto at least one of any new devices you find.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But one single EMP won't do much. It'll also have to be detonated at the right location.", 4: '3'}
